mods.abstract: RUNAWAY IN PRISON. WAS committed to jail, boy JOHN WAKER, claiming to belong to Robert Wilkinssu, of the English Turn, Parish of Plaquemines. John is about 26 years old; 5ft. 7 or 8 in. high, sprightly; plain spoken; griff; will weigh about 135 lbs. The owner is hereby notified to reclaim said Slave in the manner required by law. THEO. BLANCHARD, Sheriff.

detail.title: Gazette and sentinel. : (Plaquemine, Parish of Iberville, La.) 1858-1864
